kv7.8:1.3: Sukhavedaniyaṃ dukkhavedaniyaṃ adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ, sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, phassena sampayuttaṃ, vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, saññāya sampayuttaṃ, cetanāya sampayuttaṃ, cittena sampayuttaṃ, sārammaṇaṃ;
kv7.8:1.4: atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv7.8:1.6: nanu na sukhavedaniyaṃ na dukkhavedaniyaṃ …pe… anārammaṇaṃ;
kv7.8:1.9: Hañci na sukhavedaniyaṃ na dukkhavedaniyaṃ …pe… anārammaṇaṃ;
kv7.8:1.10: natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv7.8:3.1: ☑ Jarāmaraṇaṃ vipāko, jarāmaraṇaṃ na sukhavedaniyaṃ na dukkhavedaniyaṃ …pe… anārammaṇaṃ;
kv7.8:3.4: Phasso vipāko, phasso na sukhavedaniyo na dukkhavedaniyo …pe… anārammaṇo;
kv7.8:4.1: ☑ Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti?
kv7.8:4.3: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti?
kv7.8:6.1: ☑ Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti?
kv7.8:6.3: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti?
kv7.8:8.1: ☑ Kusalānañca akusalānañca dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti?
kv7.8:8.3: Kusalānañca akusalānañca dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti?
kv7.8:9.1: ☑ Kusalānañca akusalānañca dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, na vattabbaṃ—
kv7.8:9.4: Kusalānañca akusalānañca dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, na vattabbaṃ—
kv7.8:10.4: Nanu atthi dubbaṇṇasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ appāyukasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammanti?
kv7.8:10.6: Hañci atthi dubbaṇṇasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ appāyukasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
